name: 天神印（THE BLOCKADE）
description:
1. About games

After the war of gods and demons, the law of heaven suddenly changed, the thunder fell early so that the monks on earth could not guard against it, and a generation of proud children all fell. In the following decades, no one broke through the field of gas refining. The path of fairy cultivation was temporarily depressed. Ten thousand years later, peach Blossom village, young Qin Xiao full of pride, regardless of parents dissuade, determined to embark on the path of cultivation.
With outstanding talent, Qin Xiao smoothly worship into the Xiuxian mountain gate. However, the road to cultivating the immortal is very difficult, as time goes by, not only Qin Xiao's cultivation is becoming more and more refined, but also a group of powerful opponents have appeared in front of him, hindering his way forward. With the fall of the peach flower fairy, the disappearance of the sentence awn, the destruction of the large array, the front is more and more confusing.
In the city of the female emperor, Qin Xiao encountered the nine tails of the monster who was imprisoned in the lock demon tower for ten thousand years, although she was beautiful and gorgeous, but the means were ruthless and spicy, and countless monks died in their hands. After hard work, Qin Xiao finally defeated nine tail, but this is only the tip of the iceberg of truth. The truth of the war between gods and demons, the reason for the sudden change of the Heavenly Way, the upper God Qin Tian who fell without reason, and the Heavenly Seal that cut off the path of God... There will be more unknown waiting for Qin Xiao. In this merciless way of heaven, no one can escape from the endless vortex.

3. Game introduction module

① Map system
In this game, players will be placed in a vast expanse of large maps, free to explore, freely move forward, constantly reveal new regions and magnificent landscapes. The world is beautiful and presents multiple environments, like a peach garden in a dream. Peach blossom forest looming, as if the world fairyland; The lava beneath the volcanic crust is raging, wild and hot; Luwu towering cliffs, showing the grandeur of nature; Jia Chao's dense forest is deep and dark, hiding endless mysteries.
Each environment has unique weather patterns that add a wealth of variety to the journey of discovery. In the game, players can interact with various objects and terrain in the environment. Whether gathering rare herbs or digging up precious ores, every interaction can lead to unexpected gains. At the same time, be wary of unexpected traps and hidden map entrances that may bring new challenges and surprises to your adventure. In this vast and colorful world, exploration, adventure and discovery will be the themes of Tenji.

② The tomb system
The map is littered with the entrance to the legendary Tomb of the Gods and Demons. The player can uncover these secrets by searching for them. However, it's not enough to just find the entrance, you also need to defeat the owner of the tomb in order to gain rare rewards and a deeper understanding of the story of the game world. In this process, you will face unprecedented challenges, but also will gain endless fun and sense of accomplishment.





③ Skill schools
According to different Reiki attributes, the skill system is divided into gold, wood, water, fire, and earth five sets of system skills, and each has a different exclusive weapon. In addition, there are additional auxiliary skills of thunder, wind, and ice. At the same time, it provides the player with a rich choice of skills and collocation possibilities. Players are free to combine various skills to create unique combat styles based on their play style and needs.


④ Craft system
The skill system, as a major feature of the game, brings a richer level and depth to the game. It is independent of the skill system, allowing players to explore and learn unique skills such as drawing, alchemy, casting, and more.
By learning and mastering these skills, the player will have an advantage in battle and be able to deal with the enemy more effectively. Enriched the gameplay of the game, but also for the player to provide more freedom and choice space. Players can choose to learn and master different skills according to their own preferences and game needs to create unique characters.
